item.title: Website Revamp
item.description: Before/After of Homepage The header banner at the top of the old site looked clunky and amateurish. I made an upper nav ribbon with the contact information as actual clickable link text rather than an image of text. The way the homepage is now sectioned now makes it easy for a potential customer to browse/scroll and get an impression of the client that builds confidence.. Before/After of Product Page The "

item.title: Hooray for spiral binding
item.description: Yes! If you have a small QTY of material you need spiral bound, on the fly, 11th hour, no problemo! QTY TIME $ 1 Less than 24 hours $25 5 1-2 Days $50 10 1-5 Days $75
